register.registrationSubHeader: Just a little more details, and your account is created

disclaimer.disclaimerContents:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY

DISCLAIMER: PSYINNOVATIONS PROGRAM DOES NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE. IF AT ANY TIME YOU EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL EMERGENCY, GO TO YOUR NEAREST EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT OR CALL 911 IMMEDIATELY. DO NOT RELY ON THE PROGRAM OR wayForward TO TREAT OR DIAGNOSIS ANY EMERGENCY OR NON-EMERGENCY MEDICAL OR PSYCHIATRIC CONDITION.

All content of the PsyInnovations Program (the “Program”) and wayForward, such as text, videos, graphics, images, information and all other materials (“Content”), is solely for general information and educational purposes, or to describe PsyInnovations and the Program’s products and services, and is not complete or exhaustive. The Content is not intended or implied to provide medical, psychiatric, or other professional health care advice, or be used to assess health conditions, substitute for professional medical advice, or used or relied upon for diagnosis or treatment.

The Content does not take the place of instructions or advice from your doctor or other qualified health care professional, and may not necessarily take into account your individual health situation. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health care professional relating to any concerns you may have regarding symptoms, a medical condition, or the use of any products. Do not disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of any Content or information provided or received through your participation in the Program and/or wayForward.

If you rely on any Content obtained by you through the Program or wayForward you do so solely at your own risk. You are solely responsible for compliance with the laws and regulations applicable to your place or country of residence and accessing this Program and/or wayForward from any country where its content does not comply with its laws and regulations is prohibited.

PsyInnovations assumes no duty to correct or update the Content or to resolve or clarify any inconsistencies within the Content. PsyInnovations is not responsible for any misuses you may make of the Content. In addition, transmission of the Content is not intended to create, and receipt by you does not constitute, a physician-patient relationship with PsyInnovations, its employees, agents, independent contractors, or anyone acting on behalf of PsyInnovations.

DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES

RELIANCE ON ANY INFORMATION PROVIDED BY PSYINNOVATIONS, THE PROGRAM, PSYINNOVATIONS’ EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, INDEPENDENT CONTRACTORS, OR OTHERS ACTING ON BEHALF OF PSYINNOVATIONS, IS SOLELY AT YOUR OWN RISK. THE CONTENT IS PROVIDED AS IS OR AS AVAILABLE WITHOUT REPRESENTATION OR WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, AND NO WARRANTY OR GUARANTEE CONCERNING THE ACCURACY OF THE INFORMATION IS MADE. ALL SUCH REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES ARE HEREBY DISCLAIMED, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTIES’ RIGHTS, AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

In no event shall PsyInnovations, or any of its employees, agents, directors or officers, be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, exemplary, punitive, or any other monetary or other damages, fees, fines, penalties or liabilities arising out of or relating in any way to the participation in the Program and/or information contained in, or accessed through, the Program. In no event shall PsyInnovations, or any of its employees, directors or officers, be liable for any lost profits, lost data or business arising out of or relating in any way to the participation in the Program. Such limitation includes actions based on warranty, contract, tort or any other legal theory, and whether or not PsyInnovations is advised of the possibility of such damages.

participation.participationContents:
This Program Participation Agreement (this “Agreement”) applies to your participation in PysInnovations’ wayForward Program (the “Program”), as defined below. As a condition of registering for and participating in the Program, you must acknowledge and agree that you have read and understand all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Program Disclaimer ,incorporated herein by reference, as indicated by clicking on “I Agree” below.

Program:

The Program utilizes a mobile application called wayForward, which is designed to help users identify, cope with, and manage their anxieties through the use of self-help tools, which are communicated to the user’s mobile phone. Participation in the Program requires users to interact with the Program’s software by responding to certain questions presented to the user based on his/her input. The Program is comprised of multiple sessions of approximately five (5) to ten (10) minutes each in duration.

To register for the Program, you will be required to provide your name and a unique password.

The wayForward program does not provide any medical, psychiatric, or other professional health care advice; nor is it intended to be used to assess health conditions or substitute for professional medical advice, or relied upon for diagnosis or treatment. Such information may also not be relied upon as medical, psychiatric, or other professional health care advice. Participation in the Program and/or use of the wayForward does not, and is not intended to, create or constitute, a physician-patient relationship with PsyInnovations, its officers, directors, employees, independent contractors, agents, or anyone acting on behalf of PsyInnovations.

If you have a serious mental condition or diagnosis, or if you are considering taking actions that may cause harm to you or to others, or if you feel that you or any other person may be in any danger, or if you have any medical or psychiatric emergency, you must immediately go to the nearest emergency department or call 911. You acknowledge, confirm and agree that wayForward and PsyInnovations is not designed for use in instances of serious mental condition, diagnosis, or drug therapy.

You agree that PsyInnovations and its affiliates shall not be liable to you or anyone else for any loss or injury caused in whole or in part by relying upon, using, or interpreting the content or any other information obtained through the use of this app. In no event will PsyInnovations or its affiliates be liable to you or anyone else for any incidental, consequential, indirect, special or exemplary damages or lost profits arising out of the use or inability to use the content, the app or any other information obtained through the app, even if PsyInnovations, its affiliates, its licensors,agents, investors, or representatives know or have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

These excluded damages include, but are not limited to, medical, legal and any other malpractice damage claims or awards, pain and suffering, personal injury, wrongful death, loss of income, loss of consortium, business interruption, medical bills, damages for loss of data, loss of programs, and/or cost of procurement of substitute services or service interruptions. PsyInnovations’ cumulative liability to you or any other party for any loss or damages resulting from any claims, demands, or action arising out of or relating to wayForward or the content of this Agreement shall not exceed the fee, if any, paid by you or on your behalf for the use of wayForward for the prior twelve (12) months.

You agree to indemnify PsyInnovations, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims you may have for any services provided through wayForward for any reason whatsoever. You agree to indemnify and hold harmless PsyInnovations, its related entities, affiliates, and their directors, officers, managers, employees, donors, investors, agents and licensors, from and against all losses, expenses, damages and costs, including reasonable attorney’s fees, resulting from any violation of this Agreement.

Effective Date:

The “Effective Date” of this Agreement is the date on which you register for the Program.

Privacy:

PsyInnovations takes reasonable measures to protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration and destruction. PsyInnovations uses the HIPAA-compliant program TrueVault to protect all data collected from participants through the Program. When you access or use the app wayForwardp, PsyInnovations automatically collects information about you, including login information, device information, and your mobile phone operating system.

By registering for the Program, you agree to accept all the risks of unauthorized access to your Data, and any other information you provide to PsyInnovations and/or the Program. The prior sentence shall survive the termination or expiration of this Agreement as set forth below.

Use of Information:

PsyInnovations may use your Data which it collects through the Program for various purposes, including:

  1. Internal optimization for the wayForward;
  2. Marketing purposes to demonstrate to investors the use of the wayForward on actual users, but only after such Data has been de-identified to the extent that the recipient of such Data would not reasonably be able to use it to identify you;
  3. Monitoring and analyzing trends, usage and activities in connection with the wayForward; and
  4. Carrying out any other purpose for which the Data is collected.

Sharing Information:

PsyInnovations may share your Data which it collects through the Program as follows:

  1. With consultants and other service providers who need access to such Data to carry out their functions on PsyInnovations’ behalf;
  2. In response to a request for information, if PsyInnovations believes that such disclosure is in accordance with any applicable law, regulation or legal process, or as otherwise required by any applicable law, rule or regulation;
  3. In connection with, or during any negotiations of, any merger, sale of PsyInnovations’ assets, financing or acquisition of all or a portion of PsyInnovations’ business; and
  4. With your consent or at your direction, including if PsyInnovations notifies you through the Program and/or the wayForward that the information you provide will be shared in a particular manner, and you provide such information.

PsyInnovations may also share aggregated or de-identified Data, which cannot reasonably be used to identify you.

PsyInnovations aims to keep wayForward safe, but you use it at your own risk.PsyInnovations provides wayForward as is without any express or implied warranties. PsyInnovations does not guarantee that wayForward will be safe or secure. PsyInnovations is not responsible for the actions, content, information or data of third parties, and you release PsyInnovations, its directors, officers, employees, and agents from any claims or damages, known and unknown arising out of or in any way connected with any claim you have against any such third parties.

PsyInnovations is not responsible for data lost, exposed or used due to the nature of the Internet and digital environments, illegal actions of hackers and/or criminals, technical malfunctions of servers and databases, etc. These are your accepted risks as a user of wayForward, and a user of the Internet in general. You are agreeing to this standard in using wayForward.

Fees:

There is no charge or fee to participate in the Program; however, PsyInnovations reserves the right to charge Program participants for continued use of wayForward upon the termination or expiration of the Program, as set forth below.

Term and Termination:

Unless otherwise terminated in accordance with this Agreement, the “Term” of this Agreement will begin on the Effective Date, and continue until the completion of the Program. Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time without cause upon notice to the other party. Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement, PsyInnovations reserves the right to retain any and all Data and information provided by you during the Term of this Agreement or your participation in the Program.

Other Legal Terms:

Nothing in this Agreement shall be construed as making either party the partner, joint venture, agent, legal representative, employer or employee of the other. Neither party shall have or hold itself out to any third party as having any authority to make any statement, representations or commitments of any kind, or to take any action that shall be binding on the other, except as provided herein or authorized in writing by the party to be bound.

This Agreement shall be interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, without consideration of conflict of laws principals. This Agreement shall be binding and will inure to the benefit of the legal representatives, successors and permitted assigns of the parties hereto.

No amendment to this Agreement will be effective unless made in writing. The paragraph headings herein are solely for the sake of convenience and will not be applied in the interpretation hereof. If any provision of this Agreement is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be illegal, invalid, unenforceable, or otherwise contrary to law, the remaining provisions of this Agreement will remain in full force and effect.

PsyInnovations reserves the right to amend this Agreement at any time without notice, and only the current Agreement shall be deemed effective. Therefore, you are encouraged to check the terms of this Agreement frequently. Your continued use of wayForward will signify your acceptance of the changes to this Agreement, and your agreement to be bound by such changes to this Agreement. If you do not accept the changes, your sole and exclusive remedy is to discontinue using wayForward.

UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSED, PSYINNOVATIONS EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED,INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTY RIGHTS, WITH REGARD TO THE PROGRAM OR wayForward.

goal.goalSubHeader: My primary goal is to overcome anxiety related to:

commitment.title: COMMITMENT
commitment.commitmentHeader1: To achieve your goal it is best to do sessions daily. Use the tools regularly to master new skills acquired in the sessions.
commitment.commitmentHeader2: Consider this as self-care, fostering wellbeing for yourself and the people you interact with.

options.title: I resolve to take care of myself
